radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent change seen at the visualized lung bases. The gallbladder appeared distended; there is no evidence of pericholecystic fluid. The common duct appears dilated measuring upwards of 9 mm. Prominent pancreatic duct is also noted, measuring upwards of 3 mm.
The biliary tree appears unremarkable. Sludge was successfully extracted using balloon catheterization.
